https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/nWtjiMuWCpiJEU0K0lhwLD2Velr.jpg Margalit is a simple girl from Ashdod, waiting tables in her father's restaurant, with a dream to make it big in the music industry. It all changes one night when the famous singer Dudu Ben-David performs in Margalit's hometown. He comes to Margalit's pub, discovers her and promises to make her a big star. Days of Love
